page.title: 12Rock Band in Cockermouth
page.content: "Bass Level",the Cockermouth rock band have been back to school in a bid to win over a young audience. The four piece group played an unusual gig to help the children with a contribution for the Domesday Project. The band, including lead guitar,bass guitar,drums and vocalist was subjected to intensive interview. They delivered a three song set including band favourite "Yesterday's Man", a new song "What would I do" and a cover of the Undertone's "Teenage Kicks". The band were in great demand for an autograph session. Pupils and teachers enjoyed the "Rockschool" experience while Bass Level saw it as a very worthwhile P.R. exercise". This article appeared in the local newspaper, courtesy of the Cockermouth journalist.
